framework.name: Global Reporting Initiative
framework.description: Comprehensive sustainability reporting framework covering economic, environmental, and social impacts
framework.applicability: All organizations seeking to report on sustainability impacts

universal_standards.name: Foundation
universal_standards.description: Requirements and principles for using the GRI Standards

universal_standards.name: General Disclosures
universal_standards.description: Disclosures about the reporting organization and its reporting practices

universal_standards.name: Material Topics
universal_standards.description: Disclosures about the organization's process for determining material topics and managing impacts

economic.name: Economic Performance
economic.description: Direct economic value generated and distributed

economic.name: Market Presence
economic.description: Ratios of standard entry level wage by gender compared to local minimum wage

economic.name: Procurement Practices
economic.description: Proportion of spending on local suppliers

economic.name: Anti-corruption
economic.description: Operations assessed for risks related to corruption

economic.name: Anti-competitive Behavior
economic.description: Legal actions for anti-competitive behavior, anti-trust, and monopoly practices

environmental.name: Materials
environmental.description: Materials used by weight or volume

environmental.name: Energy
environmental.description: Energy consumption within and outside the organization

environmental.name: Water and Effluents
environmental.description: Interactions with water as a shared resource

environmental.name: Biodiversity
environmental.description: Operational sites owned, leased, managed in, or adjacent to, protected areas

environmental.name: Emissions
environmental.description: Direct and indirect greenhouse gas emissions

environmental.name: Waste
environmental.description: Waste generation and significant waste-related impacts

environmental.name: Supplier Environmental Assessment
environmental.description: New suppliers that were screened using environmental criteria

social.name: Employment
social.description: New employee hires and employee turnover

social.name: Labor/Management Relations
social.description: Minimum notice periods regarding operational changes

social.name: Occupational Health and Safety
social.description: Occupational health and safety management system

social.name: Training and Education
social.description: Average hours of training per year per employee

social.name: Diversity and Equal Opportunity
social.description: Diversity of governance bodies and employees

social.name: Non-discrimination
social.description: Incidents of discrimination and corrective actions taken

social.name: Freedom of Association and Collective Bargaining
social.description: Operations and suppliers in which the right to freedom of association and collective bargaining may be at risk

social.name: Child Labor
social.description: Operations and suppliers at significant risk for incidents of child labor

social.name: Forced or Compulsory Labor
social.description: Operations and suppliers at significant risk for incidents of forced or compulsory labor

social.name: Security Practices
social.description: Security personnel trained in human rights policies or procedures

social.name: Rights of Indigenous Peoples
social.description: Incidents of violations involving rights of indigenous peoples

social.name: Local Communities
social.description: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs

social.name: Supplier Social Assessment
social.description: New suppliers that were screened using social criteria

social.name: Customer Health and Safety
social.description: Assessment of the health and safety impacts of product and service categories

social.name: Marketing and Labeling
social.description: Requirements for product and service information and labeling

social.name: Customer Privacy
social.description: Substantiated complaints concerning breaches of customer privacy and losses of customer data

general_disclosures.title: Organizational Details
general_disclosures.description: Report the name of the organization

general_disclosures.title: Entities Included
general_disclosures.description: Report entities included in the organization's sustainability reporting

general_disclosures.title: Reporting Period
general_disclosures.description: Report the reporting period, frequency and contact point

steps.name: Understanding Context
steps.description: Understand the organization's context, including its activities, business relationships, stakeholders, and sustainability context

steps.name: Identifying Impacts
steps.description: Identify actual and potential negative and positive impacts on the economy, environment, and people

steps.name: Assessing Significance
steps.description: Assess the significance of the impacts for the purpose of reporting

steps.name: Prioritizing
steps.description: Prioritize the most significant impacts for reporting

principles.accuracy: Information must be sufficiently accurate and detailed
principles.balance: Information must reflect positive and negative aspects
principles.clarity: Information must be understandable and accessible
principles.comparability: Information must be consistent over time
principles.completeness: Information must be sufficient for stakeholders
principles.sustainability_context: Information must be presented in the context of sustainability
principles.timeliness: Information must be available in time for stakeholders
principles.verifiability: Information must be able to be examined and verified

reporting.recommendedFormat: Standalone sustainability report or integrated report
